dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2623 IS: To prohibit land management modifications relating to the Lesser Prairie Chicken.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Moran (for himself, Mr. Roberts, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Cruz, and Mr. Inhofe) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To prohibit land management modifications relating to the Lesser Prairie Chicken.

section.header: Prohibition on land management modifications relating to Lesser Prairie Chicken
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law (including regulations), the Secretary of Agriculture and the Secretary of the Interior shall not implement or limit any modification to a public or private land-related policy or subsurface mineral right-related policy or practice that is in effect on the date of enactment of this Act relating to the listing of the Lesser Prairie Chicken as a threatened species or endangered species under the Endangered Species Act of 1973 ( 16 U.S.C. 1531 et seq. ).
